# The `FortifiedLibCallSimplifier` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class implements simplifications for calls to fortified library functions (&#95;&#95;st&#42;cpy&#95;chk, &#95;&#95;memcpy&#95;chk, &#95;&#95;memmove&#95;chk, &#95;&#95;memset&#95;chk), to, when possible, replace them with their non-checking counterparts. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::FortifiedLibCallSimplifier</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class implements simplifications for calls to fortified library functions (&#95;&#95;st&#42;cpy&#95;chk, &#95;&#95;memcpy&#95;chk, &#95;&#95;memmove&#95;chk, &#95;&#95;memset&#95;chk), to, when possible, replace them with their non-checking counterparts.

Other optimizations can also be done, but it&#39;s possible to disable them and only simplify needless use of the checking versions (when the object size is unknown) by passing true for OnlyLowerUnknownSize.

Definition at line 41 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-h">SimplifyLibCalls.h</a>.

### optimizeCall() {#ab5f693b48590402b0109cfdca55ec335}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; FortifiedLibCallSimplifier::optimizeCall (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42; CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp; B)</>}>
Take the given call instruction and return a more optimal value to replace the instruction with or 0 if a more optimal form can&#39;t be found.

The call must not be an indirect call.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-h/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-h">SimplifyLibCalls.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-cpp/#l04511">4511</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-cpp">SimplifyLibCalls.cpp</a>.

## Private Member Functions

### isFortifiedCallFoldable() {#a4cfcab492bc919058e1f67913c78d8d8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool FortifiedLibCallSimplifier::isFortifiedCallFoldable (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42; CI, unsigned ObjSizeOp, std::optional&lt; unsigned &gt; SizeOp=std::nullopt, std::optional&lt; unsigned &gt; StrOp=std::nullopt, std::optional&lt; unsigned &gt; FlagsOp=std::nullopt)</>}>
Checks whether the call <code>CI</code> to a fortified libcall is foldable to the non-fortified version.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="CI">the call to the fortified libcall.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="ObjSizeOp">the index of the object size parameter of this chk function. Not optional since this is mandatory.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="SizeOp">optionally set to the parameter index of an explicit buffer size argument. For instance, set to &#39;2&#39; for &#95;&#95;strncpy&#95;chk.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="StrOp">optionally set to the parameter index of the source string parameter to strcpy-like functions, where only the strlen of the source will be writtin into the destination.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="FlagsOp">optionally set to the parameter index of a &#39;flags&#39; parameter. These are used by an implementation to opt-into stricter checking.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-h/#l00094">94</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-h">SimplifyLibCalls.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-cpp/#l04258">4258</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-cpp">SimplifyLibCalls.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### optimizeStrNCatChk() {#a01b8a10dc00dab6dab5e4713341eec5f}
